1.text: Mix wet and dry food to transition your dog to a dry diet.

2.text: Add warm water to make dry food softer.
2.vid: /f/ff/Make a Dogs Dry Food Tastier So He Will Eat It All Step 2.360p.mp4

3.text: Pour a low-sodium broth over dry food to add more flavor.
3.vid: /6/6e/Make a Dogs Dry Food Tastier So He Will Eat It All Step 3.360p.mp4

4.text: Add eggs to your dog’s food.
4.vid: /e/ec/Make a Dogs Dry Food Tastier So He Will Eat It All Step 4.360p.mp4

5.text: Mix chopped veggies or fruit into dry kibble.
5.vid: /e/e7/Make a Dogs Dry Food Tastier So He Will Eat It All Step 5.360p.mp4

6.text: Combine dry dog food and plain yogurt for a healthy gut.
6.vid: /5/55/Make a Dogs Dry Food Tastier So He Will Eat It All Step 6.360p.mp4

7.vid: /d/de/Make a Dogs Dry Food Tastier So He Will Eat It All Step 7.360p.mp4
